trends: There has been one other sighting in Mendota Heights
There were no other sightings in Mendota Heights on or around June 29th 2008
divs: Sighting Detailsmy shoes i cried my shoes..they just smiled at me ...you wont need shoes where were going ,,, all hail rob they cried in unison... which was wild because they had no mouths...thats when the big one put the crown on my head and also knighted me...you will rule the universe from earth i was told starting jan 21 2012..at 7 o clock on da dot ..ok i yelled ..trying to startle them..no luck ...soooo thats when i went for his ray gun ...i got off two shots hoping to start an intergalactic battle but my plans were foiled...yep you guessed it the big one took it from me...thats when i grabbed the wheel n hit the gas....by the time they got on there feet i had my seat belt on and shaaa whump....i hit the brakes...they flew threw the window killing them all n thus stopping an all out war of the worlds.. no no no need to thank me but i got a 2001 intergalactic space ship for sale....uses no gas...best offer
Summary: object hovered then landed then beamed me aboard.now im there god.
